ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag

Class BlockSearchingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.BlockSearchingController

  • public class BlockSearchingController
extends java.lang.Object
    BlockSearchingController is the subtask involving finding a block of a specific Color in a specified search area
    Author:
    Michael Vaquier, Oliver Clark, Zeyu Chen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BlockSearchingController.BlockSearchingState
      this enumeration delimitates the states in which the block searching controller can be in.

        localisation - The localisation association
        rightMotor - The reference to the right motor

        colorPoller - The association to the CollorPoller

        tile - The width of a tile in centimeters
        teamNumber - The team number of the robot
